prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered balanced pose holding geometric scales in one hand, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating vesica_piscis, merkaba_star, flower_of_life patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and dodecahedron emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals with ethereal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor POTHNIR's profile: 'Son of the three fold throne', Aethyr PAZ, Water element, Tarot Justice, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Libra, embodying the essence: 'In POTHNIR's presence, vision spans threefold time past, present, and future refract together into a...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth

profile_data.title: 'Son of the three fold throne'
profile_data.essence: In POTHNIR's presence, vision spans threefold time past, present, and future refract together into a single, balanced ray.
profile_data.angelic_role: Throne of Threefold Time; marshals tideborn guardians.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent, multi-layered form that shifts between liquid water and prismatic crystal structures, representing the liminal space between material and ethereal realms
profile_data.color_reasoning: Aquamarine represents water's wisdom and Netzach's transformative energy, while silver reflects the lunar cycles of time and divine reflection
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries that represent divine interconnection, dimensional transitions, and the multifaceted nature of perception
